terminal.content: Insufficient power...
Okay, terminal, terminal. Ugh, it's wet. Why is it? Wait. Copper. Oh, fuck. It's blood. Whose blood is this?
Airlock status...
Outer door: locked. Inner door: locked. Status: fully pressurized. Stable.
Crew status...
Occupant: Captain Kerrick.
Kerrick? Are you in there? Kerrick, come in. Kerrick!
EVA suit status...
EVA suits, 2 of 2 remaining. Inspection date: valid. Oxygen supply: full.
Depressurize...
Error. Crew present in airlock. Please initiate depressurization from inside the airlock.
Outer door...
Error. Airlock is currently pressurized. Please depressurize before proceeding.
Inner door...
Opening inner door.
Kerrick! Kerrick, can you hear me?
Login success. Captain Joslyn Kerrick, welcome. Please review Quarantine Status.
Diagnostic Kerrick...
Please restore power to Diagnostic Pod.

Diagnostic pod, Captain Kerrick. Accessing medical records for baseline. Scanning. Please wait. Please wait. Please wait. Diagnostics complete. Heart rate: low. Blood pressure: low. Respiratory rate: low. Oxygen saturation: error. Pathogens: error. Please consult manual. Diagnosis: hemorrhage. Medical intervention required. Please induce Cryo-sleep.
She's alive! Oh thank fuck, okay. Cryo pod, okay. I can do that. You're not dead yet, Kerrick. I've got you.
Diagnostic Quinn...
Please restore power to Diagnostic Pod.

Engineer Quinn, please enter Diagnostic Pod. Diagnostic pod, Engineer Quinn. Accessing medical records for baseline. Scanning. Please wait. Please wait. Please wait. Diagnostics complete. Heart rate: high. Blood pressure: normal. Respiratory rate: normal. Oxygen saturation: error. Pathogens: error. Please consult manual.
Yeah yeah, I got it. What the hell does that mean?
Quarantine status...
Quarantine active. Authority: Captain Joslyn Kerrick. Manual. 12.6 hours in effect. Do you wish to disable the Quarantine? Quarantine disabled. All doors unlocked.

Well, Kerrick. I don't suppose you have any interest in telling me why there's a Quarantine on this level? Well, I need to restart the reactor. If there's some kind of contaminant, I already have your blood all over me. So, Here it goes. Let's hope I did the right thing.
Cryo sleep...
The current occupant of the Diagnostic pod is: Captain Joslyn Kerrick. Do you wish to induce cryogenic stasis? Initializing cryogenic hibernation. Hibernation successful.
See you on the other side, Kerrick. That should stabilize her until we get to port.

airlock.content: Got you! Kerrick, can you hear me? Monitor, monitor. Okay, status button. SHIT! No no no. Don't be dead, please don't be dead. Kerrick? She's still warm, maybe the monitor just isn't picking up her pulse. Okay. MedBay. Diagnostic pod will know what to do.
Captain Joslyn Kerrick. No vital signs present.
